entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
